house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1954 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) . Rooms include family room, master bedroom. Features include fireplace.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Dining/Living Combo,Dishwasher, Microwave, Trash Compacter
